meta.title: Tunnet - Elegant Proxy Tool For Modern Web
meta.description: Tunnet is a cross-platform proxy tool built on Tauri and sing-box. Minimalist design, extreme performance, guarding your network connection.

title: Elegant Proxy Tool
For Modern Web
hero.subtitle: Built on Tauri & sing-box. Enjoy minimal, high-performance network connection and rule management across all platforms. No more cold configurations, but your intuitive, reliable cross-device partner.

features.section_desc: Tunnet combines modern tech stack with human-centric design, providing more than just a proxy connection.

items.title: Extreme Performance
items.description: Powered by sing-box core, delivering ultra-low latency and high-throughput network forwarding experience.

items.title: Security & Privacy
items.description: TUN mode full traffic takeover with multiple encryption protocols supported, guarding your network boundary.

items.title: Intuitive Node View
items.description: Visualize global node distribution geographically, making complex network topology clear at a glance.

items.title: Modern UI
items.description: Built with Next.js and Shadcn UI, offering an extremely smooth interactive experience and visual aesthetics.

items.title: Lightweight Architecture
items.description: Perfect combination of Rust and Go, maintaining high performance while occupying extremely low system resources.

items.title: Cross-Platform
items.description: Perfectly adapted for macOS, Windows, and Linux, providing a consistent cross-device experience.

download.title: Start Your Journey
download.agreement: By downloading, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

footer.desc: Elegant proxy tool designed for the modern internet.
